titles.title: EAGLE SOLAR Act
EAGLE SOLAR Act
Ensuring America Gets Legitimate Energy Sourced, Originating, and Leased At home Reliably Act
To amend section 8302 of title 41, United States Code, to require Buy American Act requirements to apply to solar power purchase agreements, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
Ensuring America Gets Legitimate Energy Sourced, Originating, and Leased At home Reliably Act or the EAGLE SOLAR Act
This bill modifies the Buy American Act to apply to solar power purchase agreements.
